</title>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L

<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

---

[Giant centipede](/Monsters.aspx?ID=77) venom causes severe muscle stiffness.

**Saving Throw** DC 17 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d8 poison damage and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 3** 1d12 poison damage, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), and flat-footed (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
